 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲבַקּוּק‎</span> **proper name, masculine** ==the prophet Habakkuk== [[Hab.1.1|Hab 1:1]]; [[Hab.3.1|Hab 3:1]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ἀμβακουμ</span> (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—amba‡û‡u***</u></abbr> is name of a plant, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HA 36, Pr 84</sup>, so <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in Yemen (Schweinfurth) see [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Aufsätze u. Abh. 1892, 27, 28</sup>).
